channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US court to review civil rights lawsuit alleging environmental racism in a Louisiana parish
item.description: The Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals in New Orleans is set to hear arguments in a civil rights lawsuit alleging a south Louisiana parish engaged in racist land-use policies that placed polluting industries in majority-Black communities.

item.title: LeBron and son Bronny James play together for the first time in a preseason game for the Lakers
item.description: LeBron James and his son Bronny made NBA history when they played together for the first time during the Los Angeles Lakers’ preseason game against Phoenix.

item.title: Robert Coover, innovative author and teacher, dies at 92
item.description: Experimental author Robert Coover has died at age 92. Coover was a rule-defying fiction writer and educator who advocated for new approaches to literature through such works as “The Babysitter” and “The Public Burning” and through his decades on the faculty of Brown University.
